Question
========

Bette would like to evaluate gender (male/female) balance among scientists. There are 18 men in a randomly selected sample of in total 42 scientists. Is the percentage male scientists statistically significantly different from the percentage female scientists?
  
Answerlist
----------
* Yes, P <.05
* Yes, .05 < P <.10
* No, .10 < P <.20
* No, P >.20

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
